member.name: T:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Conversion.ConversionAPIClient
member.summary: This class converts WKT geometry objects into GeoJSON.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Conversion.ConversionAPIClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Conversion.ConversionAPIClient class.
member.param: The current instance of the HTTPClient class.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Conversion.ConversionAPIClient.ToGeoJson(GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.WKT,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Converts a WKT geometry string into a GeoJson Feature(Collection) string.
member.param: A WKT type.
Indicates whether to include the GeoJson feature in a feature collection.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A GeoJson string with the converted WKT geometry.

member.summary: Interface for ConversionAPI class.

member.summary: Converts a WKT geometry string into a GeoJson Feature(Collection) string.
member.param: A WKT type.
Indicates whether to include the GeoJson feature in a feature collection.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A GeoJson string with the converted WKT geometry.

member.summary: Create the client object with specified base URL, service key and timeout.

The service key.
Web request time out in seconds

member.name: T:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate
member.summary: This class represents a location on the earth's surface.

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate.Lat
member.summary: Specifies the east-west position of a point on the earth's surface.

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate.Lon
member.summary: Specifies the north-south position of a point on the earth's surface.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate class.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Coordinate class.
member.param: Specifies the east-west position of a point on the earth's surface.
Specifies the north-south position of a point on the earth's surface.

member.name: T:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location
member.summary: This class represents a location on earth in both RDNew (EPSG:28992) and WGS84 (EPSG:4326) projections.

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.X
member.summary: The X location ('Easting') in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.Y
member.summary: The Y location ('Northing') in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.Lat
member.summary: The latitude (east-west position) in WGS84 Mercator projection (EPSG:4326).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.Lon
member.summary: The longitude (north-south) in WGS84 Mercator projection (EPSG:4326).

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location class.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Location class.
member.param: The X location ('Easting') in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).
The Y location ('Northing') in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).
The latitude (east-west position) in WGS84 Mercator projection (EPSG:4326).
The longitude (north-south) in WGS84 Mercator projection (EPSG:4326).

member.name: T:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint
member.summary: This class represents a pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that define a point in the Rijksdriehoeksstelsel coordinate system (EPSG:28992).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the point in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the point in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint class.

member.name: M:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.RDPoint class.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the point in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).
The y-coordinate of the point in RDNew projection (EPSG:28992).

member.name: P:GISBlox.Services.SDK.Models.Subscription.Expired
